article_title: Congress's Long And Sordid History Of Handing States Money With Strings Attached

article_metadata.author: Merrill Matthews

og.description: Obamacare made health insurance subsidies contingent on a state creating its own insurance exchange; that mandate with financial strings attached is how Congress has imposed its will on states for decades.
og.title: Congress's Long And Sordid History Of Handing States Money With Strings Attached
